Package DAO

Class AppointmentDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentDAO
public class AppointmentDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for Appointment CRUD and reporting queries. Handles saving, updating, deleting, and fetching appointment data (with contact join).

      public static void addAppointment(Appointment appt) throws SQLException

      SQLException

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all appointments, including contact name by joining contacts table. Converts stored UTC timestamps back to local time.
      Throws:
      SQLException
